::Shredder::

Shredder lands along with the Destrons, also entering the base (if 
its open). He activates his comm.

"We're here, Magmatron." He reports simply, waiting for a responce.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: I have read a VERY large number of messages, both last night 
and this 
> morning, so please forgive me if this is wrong.
> 
> :::The Protectrons/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Orion/Torca/The 
> Destrocons/Falcon/Snare/Bludgeon/Starscream/Obsidian:::
> 
> ::My Maximals think for awhile. they decide that it is better to 
stop 
> fighting for now::
> Sky Lynx: Were with you Iron Raptor.
> Ratchet: Its nothing personal, Angel Prime, but were all badly 
damaged.
> ::They see that the battle is starting again::
> Orion: Oh no, not again.
> Torca: Should we open fire, Iron Raptor?
> ~~~~~
> ::My Destrons fly into the base::
> ~~~~~
> ::My Predacons land, but cant find anybody.  Starscream opens up a 
comm::
> Starscream: Drillbit, where are you guys? Whats the situation?
